name: Crupt (itch)
description:
Slash through swarms of enemies, fight bosses, and talk to wacky characters as you struggle to restore everything one Wave at a time.   Everything is kinda ruined, so good luck or something. In Crupt, each Wave will present you with a new enemy to fight and a different building to restore. With every Wave you conquer, you'll expand your arsenal along with your social circle as you try to bring back everyone and everything.   Features: 
  •  20 Waves with a new enemy to accompany each Wave 
  •  A big boss thing every 5 Waves 
  •  A building (or part of a building) to repair each Wave 
  •  A new wacky character to talk to for every building repaired 
  •  Resource management elements let you experience the wonders of semi-passive income 
  •  Like 50 Items to buy 
  •  Post-game content 
  •  Achievements, if you're into that sorta thing 
  •  Original soundtrack and (mostly) cute pixel art graphics 
  •  Meet? 
  •  Plenty of Bundles 
  •  Chups, Flumps, Squmps, and even Lubs
